scripts.codeartifact:team5: aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository shared-services --domain vf-team5 --domain-owner 333038793868 --namespace @vf-team5 --region us-east-1
scripts.package:create: npm run codeartifact:team5 && cd packages && tsdxw create ${PACKAGE}
scripts.install:deps: npm i -D @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser typescript ts-node prettier eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-jest eslint-plugin-import eslint-config-prettier eslint-config-airbnb-base eslint @types/node npm-check-updates npm-run-all
scripts.install: npm run codeartifact:team5 && lerna run i
scripts.test: echo "Error: TODO - run lerna run test here"
scripts.deploy: (cd infra && npm run deploy) && (if [[ $SEED == "true" ]]; then aws s3 cp ./lib/seederHelpers/seederData/toDeploy/seed-${ENVIRONMENT}.json s3://vf-us-bank-${ENVIRONMENT}-seeds; fi) && (cd ui/admin && npm run deploy:sync) && (cd ui/voicemail && npm run deploy)
scripts.destroy: (cd connect && npm run sls:remove) && (cd chat && npm run sls:remove) && (cd infra && npm run cdk destroy '*')
